org.apache.catalina.ssi
Class SSIServlet

java.lang.Object
  javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
          org.apache.catalina.ssi.SSIServlet
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
public class SSIServlet
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet

Servlet to process SSI requests within a webpage. Mapped to a path from within web.xml.

Version:
$Revision: 466595 $, $Date: 2006-10-21 18:24:41 -0400 (Sat, 21 Oct 2006) $
Author:
Bip Thelin, Amy Roh, Dan Sandberg
